name: Rogue Rat
description:
ROGUE RAT

A bite-size adventure, explore a dungeon, and defeat the evil within!

HOW TO PLAY

Make your way through the dungeon, solving puzzles and slaying enemies.

CONTROLS

Arrow keys for eight-directional controls.
Z - To strike forwards (attack the direction the character is currently facing)
X - After you found the bomb ability, you can place bombs to kill enemies and create new pathways. (be aware that you could potentially get hurt in the process)
Mouse - navigate menus

Created for #SodorJam2022 in two weeks.
Jam theme: "Zelda Clone"

CREDITS
  • @Anchimayen_Art - art, music, SFX
  • @FletchMakes - programming, level design
TOOLS:
  • GameMaker Studio 2 - game engine
  • Aseprite - pixel art & animation
  • Beepbox.co - music & sfx
